title: WELCOME TO THE COURSE.
description: Hello students,  Welcome to our recorded course for class 12th CBSE board. We have provided you the highest quality teaching videos possible on the internet. These lectures are by IITians who themselves had secured under 1000 ranks and also helped 100s of students score that. These teachers had also helped students score 95%+ marks in boards, which is commendable.   All the videos are clubbed with Notes & Practice problems. You have the option to download the video as well and watch offline.   Although most of the videos are already uploaded, still some videos might be missing. Please don’t worry if you find some missing lecture then let us know by filling this form below. Also any suggestions/feedback you have will also be helpful. .
